buttonDetails.title: Watchlist
buttonDetails.explanation: A watchlist allows users to create and maintain a personalized list of stocks or securities.

buttonDetails.title: Market Depth
buttonDetails.explanation: Market depth in Zerodha UI shows the current buying and selling interest for a stock, helping traders understand supply and demand.

buttonDetails.title: Timeframe
buttonDetails.explanation: Enables users to select a specific time interval, with each candlestick representing price movements over that chosen timeframe, such as 5 minutes.

buttonDetails.title: Current Price
buttonDetails.explanation: The current price reflects the most recent trading price of a security, providing real-time market value.

buttonDetails.title: Moving Average
buttonDetails.explanation: The 30-minute moving average calculates the average price of a security over a 30-minute period, aiding in trend identification and analysis.

buttonDetails.title: Volume
buttonDetails.explanation: Volume represents the total number of shares traded during a specified period, higher the volume higher the liquidity.

buttonDetails.title: NSE, BSE
buttonDetails.explanation: This button position selects the exchange, allowing for BSE or NSE selection.

buttonDetails.title: CNC, MIS
buttonDetails.explanation: This button selects between CNC (delivery) and MIS (intraday) order types for executing trades.
Selecting this button enables stop loss and helps managing risk.
buttonDetails.title: Stop Loss

buttonDetails.explanation: This button shows the total amount payable and associated charges for the transaction.
buttonDetails.title: Amount Payable

buttonDetailsMD.explanation: This button position is for selecting the exchange (BSE or NSE).
This button is for selecting order types (CNC and MIS) and their purpose.
Explanation about stop loss and its importance.
Information about total amount and charges.

buttonDetails.title: Share Selection
buttonDetails.explanation: The symbol of the share on which order was executed.

buttonDetails.title: Order Type
buttonDetails.explanation: Which type of order was it, was it delivery CNC or intraday MIS.

buttonDetails.title: Order Status
buttonDetails.explanation: Indicates the current status of the order, was the order completed or pending.

buttonDetails.title: Contract Note
buttonDetails.explanation: Provides a summary of charges associated with each order.
